languages.text: {n}Идира хитро подмигивает вам в ответ.{/n} "Как скажете, Лорд-капитан, сейчас все его секретики-то и узнаем! Только не ручаюсь, что у него мозги в кашу после этого не обратятся. Но это ж ничего, допустимые жертвы, так?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира хитро подмигивает вам в ответ.{/n} "Как скажете, Лорд-капитан, сейчас все его секретики-то и узнаем! Только не ручаюсь, что у него мозги в кашу после этого не обратятся. Но это ж ничего, допустимые жертвы, так?"

languages.text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира хитро подмигивает вам в ответ.{/n} "Как скажете, Лорд-капитан, сейчас все его секретики-то и узнаем! Только не ручаюсь, что у него мозги в кашу после этого не обратятся. Но это ж ничего, допустимые жертвы, так?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll know all his secrets in a flash! Though I can't guarantee his brains won't be turned to mush in the process. But that's an acceptable loss, right?"

{n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a flash! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

{n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

{n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

languages.text: {n}Idira zwinkert verschmitzt zurück.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, Lord Captain! Wir werden seine Geheimnisse bald kennen! Wobei ich nicht garantieren kann, dass sein Gehirn dabei nicht zu Brei verkommt. Aber das ist dann einfach ein Kollateralschaden, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira zwinkert verschmitzt zurück.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, Lord Captain! Wir werden seine Geheimnisse bald kennen! Wobei ich nicht garantieren kann, dass sein Gehirn dabei nicht zu Brei verkommt. Aber das ist dann einfach ein Kollateralschaden, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: {n}Idira vous renvoie votre clin d'œil d'un air sournois.{/n} « Comme vous voudrez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous allons découvrir tous ses secrets, bien que je ne puisse garantir que son cerveau résiste à l'opération... mais ce sont les risques du métier, pas vrai ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira vous renvoie votre clin d'œil d'un air sournois.{/n} « Comme vous voudrez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous allons découvrir tous ses secrets, bien que je ne puisse garantir que son cerveau résiste à l'opération... mais ce sont les risques du métier, pas vrai ? »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉狡猾地向你眨眨眼。{/n}“如你所愿，舰长大人！只要一瞬间，他所有的秘密都会在我们眼前表露无疑！至于他的脑子会不会化成浆糊，我恐怕保证不了。不过，那并不重要，对吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉狡猾地向你眨眨眼。{/n}“如你所愿，舰长大人！只要一瞬间，他所有的秘密都会在我们眼前表露无疑！至于他的脑子会不会化成浆糊，我恐怕保证不了。不过，那并不重要，对吧？”

languages.text: {n}イディラは、いたずらっぽくあなたに目配せを返す。{/n}「仰せのままに、ロード・キャプテン！彼の秘密全部をすぐにさらけ出してやるわ！処置中にその脳がぐずぐずに溶けないって保証はできないけど。情報と引き換えだからいいわよね？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは、いたずらっぽくあなたに目配せを返す。{/n}「仰せのままに、ロード・キャプテン！彼の秘密全部をすぐにさらけ出してやるわ！処置中にその脳がぐずぐずに溶けないって保証はできないけど。情報と引き換えだからいいわよね？」

languages.text: {n}Idira te guiña un ojo disimuladamente.{/n} «¡Como ordene, Lord Capitán! ¡Desvelaremos todos sus secretos en un periquete! Aunque no puedo garantizar que sus sesos no se derritan en el proceso. Pero eso es secundario, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te guiña un ojo disimuladamente.{/n}«¡Como ordene, Lord Capitán!». ¡Desvelaremos todos sus secretos en un abrir y cerrar de ojos! Aunque no puedo garantizar que sus sesos no se derritan en el proceso. Pero eso es secundario, ¿no?».

languages.text: {n}İdira da sana kurnazca göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Nasıl isterseniz Lord Kaptan! Tüm sırları bir çırpıda çıkar ortaya! Lakin bu süreçte beyninin pekmez olup akmayacağını garanti edemem. Eğitim zayiatı deriz artık, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira winks back at you slyly.{/n} "As you wish, Lord Captain! We'll reveal all his secrets in a jiff! Though I can't guarantee that his brains won't melt into mush in the process. But that's collateral, right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira da sana kurnazca göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Nasıl isterseniz Lord Kaptan! Tüm sırları bir çırpıda çıkar ortaya! Lakin bu süreçte beyninin pekmez olup akmayacağını garanti edemem. Eğitim zayiatı deriz artık, değil mi?"
